name: Play for Granny or Grandpa
description:
Choose for whom you will play Granny or Grandpa. Both of them are serious rivals and everyone can catch a prisoner. 

Make your choice and don't let the prisoner escape from the scary house. The prisoner wanted to get into the house unnoticed, but the granny and grandpa were able to catch the thief and detain him. But the thief got out and now wants to run away from the house and avoid punishment. 

Granny and Grandpa are trying to find and stop the prisoner. They have limited time to catch the thief. 

App store RELEASE! Google Play RELEASE!
